author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

In response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31451#issuecomment-693682969 to address warnings like 

```
%MSG-e GEMPadDigiProducer:  GEMPadDigiProducer:simMuonGEMPadDigis  14-Sep-2020 20:54:58 CEST Run: 1 Event: 1
GE2/1 geometry (8 partition) appears corrupted
%MSG
```

#### PR validation:

Tested with WF 30634.0 (step1 and step2) introduced in #31451.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Update geometry check in GEMPadDigiProducer
